abstract.p: Sawyer Riley Compton in Atlanta takes top honors, winning three awards at Creative Excellence in Business Advertising competition sponsored by American Business Press in New York (S)

block.p: Sawyer Riley Compton in Atlanta took top honors, winning three awards, at the Creative Excellence in Business Advertising competition sponsored by the American Business Press in New York.

At a ceremony last week in New York, Sawyer Riley won the best of show award as well as a category award for work for Elanco Animal Health, a unit of Eli Lilly & Company in Indianapolis. Another campaign for Elanco also won an award in a second category.
Sawyer Riley Compton in Atlanta took top honors, winning three awards, at the Creative Excellence in Business Advertising competition sponsored by the American Business Press in New York.

At a ceremony last week in New York, Sawyer Riley won the best of show award as well as a category award for work for Elanco Animal Health, a unit of Eli Lilly & Company in Indianapolis. Another campaign for Elanco also won an award in a second category.

Martin/Williams in Minneapolis, a unit of GGT Group, was presented an award for work for the Flyshacker Clothing Company in Brookfield, Conn. And Time Warner Inc. in New York received the Norman L. Cahners Lifetime Achievement Award for outstanding corporate image advertising.
